ssot__LoyaltyMemberTier__dlm.name: Loyalty Member Tier
ssot__LoyaltyMemberTier__dlm.description: The Loyalty Member Tier DMO represents the benefit tier within the program that a member is assigned to.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EffectiveDate__c.description: The date when a member joined the loyalty tier.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyMemberTierChangeTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to change type of loyalty member tier.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Loyalty Member Tier DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to individual who joined loyalty program.

ssot__LoyaltyTierId__c.description: A reference ID to tier of loyalty program. Member benefits increase as member moves up loyalty program hierarchy.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of loyalty member tier.
